trans-unit.target: Chi rij ri Raqanib’al Choltzij ruk' wachib'al

trans-unit.source: Use this template to make a picture dictionary that is monolingual, bilingual, or trilingual.
trans-unit.target: Chkojo’ we raqanib’al chech ub’anik jun Choltzij ruk' wachib'al pa jun tzijob’al, keb’ tzijob’al te'qne oxib’ tzijob’al.

trans-unit.source: This book is currently marked "experimental" because we know of several problems in layout and convenience.
trans-unit.target: Chanim we no'jwuj ri’ kojom retal chi xa "upajik ukojik" xa rumal qeta’m chik k’i taq k’axk’olil kriqitaj chech ri uwokob’axik xuquje’ ri utzilal ukojik.
